content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Burner mining drills and burners inserters are currently without fuel.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it.
- The steam engine at position (x=117.5 y=-30.5) is currently not connected.

### Errors when using electricity group
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to use it.
- The electricity group at position (x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668) is currently not plugged in.

### Errors when using pipe group
- Ensure that the pipe group is not empty before attempting to use it.
- The pipe group at position (x=107.5 y=-34.5) is currently empty.

### Errors when using belt group
- Ensure that the belt group is not empty before attempting to use it.
- The belt group at position (x=40.5 y=-83.5) is currently empty.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
